t: Is Notion Press better than Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): It is a difficult question to get an accurate answer to. The most effective answer would, perhaps, be from an author who has published the same book on both platforms. Even then, it might not be very accurate considering many factors affect book publishing and marketing. Still, ...
July 24, 2024 - Notion Press is an Indian self-publishing company based in Chennai, India. It was founded in 2012, and in 2016 it claimed to have provided services to 2000 self-published authors.

t: NotionPress - 2025 Company Profile, Funding, Competitors & Financials - Tracxn
s: April 26, 2025 - NotionPress - Online self publishing platform to help publish and sell books. Raised a total funding of $1.04M over 2 rounds from 10 investors. Valued at $4.44M. Founded by Jana Pillay, Naveen Valsakumar and 1 other in the year 2012. NotionPress has 314 competitors.
